name: Crazy Animal Heroes
description:
Oh! Poor Froggie is stuck on the other side of the road. He has a lot of hurdles to cross and collect as many coins as possible.

Froggie needs to avoid incoming fires, arcs, razor sharp cutters, and cannon balls. The only way froggie can reach to move fast forward.

HOW TO PLAY

Tap on froggie surroundings and froggie will move accordingly. Froggie can stop and wait for the hurdle to cross him and then he can move.

Lets see who can take froggie to the other side with maximum coins. Coins it is and coins it will be says the Froggie. He is one crazy animal

Gamebread "Live to Play"
